channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Four people on NASA'S Crew-12 arrive at the International Space Station
item.description: The crew will spend the next eight months conducting experiments to prepare for human exploration beyond Earth's orbit.
item.content:encoded:
The crew will spend the next eight months conducting experiments to prepare for human exploration beyond Earth's orbit.

(Image credit: NASA)
item.dc:creator: Lydia Calitri

item.title: US military reports a series of airstrikes against Islamic State targets in Syria
item.description: The U.S. military says the strikes were carried out in retaliation of the December ambush that killed two U.S. soldiers and one American civilian interpreter.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. military says the strikes were carried out in retaliation of the December ambush that killed two U.S. soldiers and one American civilian interpreter.

(Image credit: Lolita Baldor)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: ChatGPT promised to help her find her soulmate. Then it betrayed her
item.description: ChatGPT sent screenwriter Micky Small down a fantastical rabbit hole. Now, she's finding her way out.
item.content:encoded:
ChatGPT sent screenwriter Micky Small down a fantastical rabbit hole. Now, she's finding her way out.

(Image credit: Courtney Theophin)
item.dc:creator: Shannon Bond

item.title: Ilia Malinin, U.S. figure skater favored for gold, finishes 8th
item.description: Malinin, undefeated since 2023, stumbled and fell multiple times, landing far off the podium. Mikhail Shaidorov of Kazakhstan won gold in an upset that shocked even himself.
item.content:encoded:
Malinin, undefeated since 2023, stumbled and fell multiple times, landing far off the podium. Mikhail Shaidorov of Kazakhstan won gold in an upset that shocked even himself.

(Image credit: Andreas Rentz)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: DHS says immigration agents appear to have lied about shooting in Minnesota
item.description: Julio Cesar Sosa-Celis was shot in the leg during the incident. Another Venezuelan man was also accused of attacking an immigration officer.
item.content:encoded:
Julio Cesar Sosa-Celis was shot in the leg during the incident. Another Venezuelan man was also accused of attacking an immigration officer.

(Image credit: John Moore)
item.dc:creator: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán

item.title: DHS is poised for a shutdown after lawmakers fail to strike a deal on funding
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security is on track to shut down Friday night after Congress left town without a deal to fund the department and limit the tactics of federal immigration officers.
item.content:encoded: The Department of Homeland Security is on track to shut down Friday night after Congress left town without a deal to fund the department and limit the tactics of federal immigration officers.
item.dc:creator: Sam Gringlas

item.title: It's been five years since catastrophic Texas blackouts. How much has changed?
item.description: Power companies say they're better prepared for extreme weather, but challenges remain to electricity production as the state's demand grows
item.content:encoded:
Power companies say they're better prepared for extreme weather, but challenges remain to electricity production as the state's demand grows

(Image credit: Ron Jenkins)
item.dc:creator: Natalie Weber

item.title: FBI releases description of suspect, increases reward in Nancy Guthrie case
item.description: The FBI describes the armed man caught on Nancy Guthrie's camera as 5-foot-9-inches to 5-foot-10 and of average build. The 84-year-old mother of Savannah Guthrie has been missing since Feb. 1.
item.content:encoded: The FBI describes the armed man caught on Nancy Guthrie's camera as 5-foot-9-inches to 5-foot-10 and of average build. The 84-year-old mother of Savannah Guthrie has been missing since Feb. 1.
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise

item.title: Virginia court allows Democrats' redistricting vote in their plan to counter to Trump
item.description: The ruling allows an April election where voters can let the legislature draw a new congressional map. It could help Democrats win more House seats. Republicans might still fight it in court.
item.content:encoded:
The ruling allows an April election where voters can let the legislature draw a new congressional map. It could help Democrats win more House seats. Republicans might still fight it in court.

(Image credit: Shaban Athuman)
item.dc:creator: Jahd Khalil

item.title: Minnesota immigration crackdown will end, border czar says. And, DHS funding to expire
item.description: Border czar Tom Homan announced that the Trump administration will end the immigration crackdown in Minnesota. And, DHS funding is set to expire after lawmakers failed to advance a spending bill.
item.content:encoded:
Border czar Tom Homan announced that the Trump administration will end the immigration crackdown in Minnesota. And, DHS funding is set to expire after lawmakers failed to advance a spending bill.

(Image credit: Steve Karnowski)
item.dc:creator: Suzanne Nuyen
